author: Vexed (Vexed#0714)
description:
Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues, with partial PR support.

⚠ This cog requires Red 3.5/discord.py 2, which is unstable and incompatibe with some other cogs. ⚠
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! Load the cog and get started with the `calculator` command.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/ghissues>
name: GHIssues
short: [DPY 2 ONLY] Create, comment, labelify and close GitHub issues.
